1: וַ֭יַּעַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>Then answered</n> צֹפַ֥ר <sup>6691 </sup> <n>Zophar</n> הַנַּֽעֲמָתִ֗י <sup>5284 </sup> <n>the Naamathite</n> וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n>
2: לָ֭כֵן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> שְׂעִפַּ֣י <sup>5587 </sup> <n>Therefore do my thoughts</n> יְשִׁיב֑וּנִי <sup>7725 </sup> <n>cause me to answer</n> וּ֝בַעֲב֗וּר <sup>5668 </sup> <n>because</n> ח֣וּשִׁי <sup>2363 </sup> <n>and for [this] I make haste</n> בִֽי׃
3: מוּסַ֣ר <sup>4148 </sup> <n>the check</n> כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <sup>3639 </sup> <n>of my reproach</n> אֶשְׁמָ֑ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>I have heard</n> וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and the spirit</n> מִֽבִּינָתִ֥י <sup>998 </sup> <n>of my understanding</n> יַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>causeth me to answer</n>
4: הֲזֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>you</n> יָ֭דַעְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Knowest</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> עַ֑ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>thou [not] this of old</n> מִנִּ֤י <sup>4480 </sup> <n>From</n> שִׂ֖ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>was placed</n> אָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>since man</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon earth</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>That</n> רִנְנַ֣ת <sup>7445 </sup> <n>That the triumphing</n> רְ֭שָׁעִים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> מִקָּר֑וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[is] short</n> וְשִׂמְחַ֖ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>and the joy</n> חָנֵ֣ף <sup>2611 </sup> <n>of the hypocrite</n> עֲדֵי־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> רָֽגַע׃ <sup>7281 </sup> <n>instant</n>
6: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> יַעֲלֶ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>mount up</n> לַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>to the heavens</n> שִׂיא֑וֹ <sup>7863 </sup> <n>Though his excellency</n> וְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>and his head</n> לָעָ֥ב <sup>5645 </sup> <n>unto the clouds</n> יַגִּֽיעַ׃ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>reach</n>
7: כְּֽ֭גֶלֲלוֹ <sup>1561 </sup> <n>like his own dung</n> לָנֶ֣צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n> יֹאבֵ֑ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>[Yet] he shall perish</n> רֹ֝אָ֗יו <sup>7200 </sup> <n>they which have seen</n> יֹאמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>him shall say</n> אַיּֽוֹ׃ <sup>335 </sup> <n>Where</n>
8: כַּחֲל֣וֹם <sup>2472 </sup> <n>as a dream</n> יָ֭עוּף <sup>5774 </sup> <n>He shall fly away</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יִמְצָא֑וּהוּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and shall not be found</n> וְ֝יֻדַּ֗ד <sup>5074 </sup> <n>yea he shall be chased away</n> כְּחֶזְי֥וֹן <sup>2384 </sup> <n>as a vision</n> לָֽיְלָה׃ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>of the night</n>
9: עַ֣יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>The eye</n> שְׁ֭זָפַתּוּ <sup>7805 </sup> <n>also [which] saw</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תוֹסִ֑יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>him shall [see him] no more</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> ע֝֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> תְּשׁוּרֶ֥נּוּ <sup>7789 </sup> <n>any more behold</n> מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>neither shall his place</n>
10: בָּ֭נָיו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>His children</n> יְרַצּ֣וּ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>shall seek to please</n> דַלִּ֑ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> וְ֝יָדָ֗יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and his hands</n> תָּשֵׁ֥בְנָה <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall restore</n> אוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>202 </sup> <n>their goods</n>
11: עַ֭צְמוֹתָיו <sup>6106 </sup> <n>His bones</n> מָלְא֣וּ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>are full</n> [עֲלוּמֹו כ] (עֲלוּמָ֑יו <sup>5934 </sup> <n>youth</n> ק) וְ֝עִמּ֗וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> עָפָ֥ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>with him in the dust</n> תִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>which shall lie down</n>
12: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> תַּמְתִּ֣יק <sup>4985 </sup> <n>be sweet</n> בְּפִ֣יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>in his mouth</n> רָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>Though wickedness</n> יַ֝כְחִידֶ֗נָּה <sup>3582 </sup> <n>[though] he hide</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> לְשׁוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>it under his tongue</n>
13: יַחְמֹ֣ל <sup>2550 </sup> <n>[Though] he spare</n> עָ֭לֶיהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and will not</n> יַֽעַזְבֶ֑נָּה <sup>5800 </sup> <n>it and forsake</n> וְ֝יִמְנָעֶ֗נָּה <sup>4513 </sup> <n>it not but keep it still</n> בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>within</n> חִכּֽוֹ׃ <sup>2441 </sup> <n>his mouth</n>
14: לַ֭חְמוֹ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>[Yet] his meat</n> בְּמֵעָ֣יו <sup>4578 </sup> <n>in his bowels</n> נֶהְפָּ֑ךְ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>is turned</n> מְרוֹרַ֖ת <sup>4846 </sup> <n>[it is] the gall</n> פְּתָנִ֣ים <sup>6620 </sup> <n>of asps</n> בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>within</n>
15: חַ֣יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>riches</n> בָּ֭לַע <sup>1104 </sup> <n>He hath swallowed down</n> וַיְקִאֶ֑נּוּ <sup>6958 </sup> <n>and he shall vomit them up again</n> מִ֝בִּטְנ֗וֹ <sup>990 </sup> <n>of his belly</n> יֽוֹרִשֶׁ֥נּוּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall cast them out</n> אֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n>
16: רֹאשׁ־ <sup>7219 </sup> <n>the poison</n> פְּתָנִ֥ים <sup>6620 </sup> <n>of asps</n> יִינָ֑ק <sup>3243 </sup> <n>He shall suck</n> תַּֽ֝הַרְגֵ֗הוּ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>shall slay</n> לְשׁ֣וֹן <sup>3956 </sup> <n>tongue</n> אֶפְעֶֽה׃ <sup>660 </sup> <n>the viper's</n>
17: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>does not</n> יֵ֥רֶא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>He shall not see</n> בִפְלַגּ֑וֹת <sup>6390 </sup> <n>the rivers</n> נַהֲרֵ֥י <sup>5104 </sup> <n>the floods</n> נַ֝חֲלֵ֗י <sup>5158 </sup> <n>the brooks</n> דְּבַ֣שׁ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>of honey</n> וְחֶמְאָֽה׃ <sup>2529 </sup> <n>and butter</n>
18: מֵשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>for shall he restore</n> יָ֭גָע <sup>3022 </sup> <n>That which he laboured</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and cannot</n> יִבְלָ֑ע <sup>1104 </sup> <n>and shall not swallow [it] down</n> כְּחֵ֥יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>according to [his] substance</n> תְּ֝מוּרָת֗וֹ <sup>8545 </sup> <n>[shall] the restitution</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יַעֲלֹֽס׃ <sup>5965 </sup> <n>[be] and he shall not rejoice</n>
19: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רִ֭צַּץ <sup>7533 </sup> <n>Because he hath oppressed</n> עָזַ֣ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>[and] hath forsaken</n> דַּלִּ֑ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> בַּ֥יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>an house</n> גָּ֝זַ֗ל <sup>1497 </sup> <n>[because] he hath violently taken away</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> יִבֶנֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>which he builded</n>
20: כִּ֤י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָדַ֣ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Surely he shall not feel</n> שָׁלֵ֣ו <sup>7961 </sup> <n>quietness</n> בְּבִטְנ֑וֹ <sup>990 </sup> <n>in his belly</n> בַּ֝חֲמוּד֗וֹ <sup>2530 </sup> <n>of that which he desired</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>he shall not save</n>
21: אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>Nothing</n> שָׂרִ֥יד <sup>8300 </sup> <n>be left</n> לְאָכְל֑וֹ <sup>400 </sup> <n>There shall none of his meat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֝֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָחִ֥יל <sup>2342 </sup> <n>therefore shall no man look</n> טוּבֽוֹ׃ <sup>2898 </sup> <n>for his goods</n>
22: בִּמְלֹ֣אות <sup>4390 </sup> <n>the fullness</n> שִׂ֭פְקוֹ <sup>5607 </sup> <n>of his sufficiency</n> יֵ֣צֶר <sup>3334 </sup> <n>he shall be in straits</n> ל֑וֹ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of everyone</n> יַ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>every hand</n> עָמֵ֣ל <sup>6001 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> תְּבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n>
23: יְהִ֤י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְמַלֵּ֬א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>[When] he is about to fill</n> בִטְנ֗וֹ <sup>990 </sup> <n>his belly</n> יְֽשַׁלַּח־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>[God] shall cast</n> בּ֭וֹ חֲר֣וֹן <sup>2740 </sup> <n>the fury</n> אַפּ֑וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>of his wrath</n> וְיַמְטֵ֥ר <sup>4305 </sup> <n>upon him and shall rain</n> עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בִּלְחוּמֽוֹ׃ <sup>3894 </sup> <n>[it] upon him while he is eating</n>
24: יִ֭בְרַח <sup>1272 </sup> <n>He shall flee</n> מִנֵּ֣שֶׁק <sup>5402 </sup> <n>weapon</n> בַּרְזֶ֑ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>from the iron</n> תַּ֝חְלְפֵ֗הוּ <sup>2498 </sup> <n>shall strike him through</n> קֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>[and] the bow</n> נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <sup>5154 </sup> <n>of steel</n>
25: שָׁלַף֮ <sup>8025 </sup> <n>It is drawn</n> וַיֵּצֵ֪א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and cometh out</n> מִגֵּ֫וָ֥ה <sup>1465 </sup> <n>of the body</n> וּ֭בָרָק <sup>1300 </sup> <n>yea the glittering sword</n> מִֽמְּרֹרָת֥וֹ <sup>4846 </sup> <n>of his gall</n> יַהֲלֹ֗ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>cometh out</n> עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֵמִֽים׃ <sup>367 </sup> <n>terrors</n>
26: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Complete</n> חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>All darkness</n> טָמ֪וּן <sup>2934 </sup> <n>[shall be] hid</n> לִצְפּ֫וּנָ֥יו <sup>6845 </sup> <n>in his secret places</n> תְּ֭אָכְלֵהוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall consume</n> אֵ֣שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נֻפָּ֑ח <sup>5301 </sup> <n>not blown</n> יֵ֖רַע <sup>3415 </sup> <n>him it shall go ill</n> שָׂרִ֣יד <sup>8300 </sup> <n>with him that is left</n> בְּאָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>in his tabernacle</n>
27: יְגַלּ֣וּ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>shall reveal</n> שָׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>The heaven</n> עֲוֹנ֑וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>his iniquity</n> וְ֝אֶ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the earth</n> מִתְקוֹמָ֘מָ֥ה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall rise up</n> לֽוֹ׃
28: יִ֭גֶל <sup>1540 </sup> <n>shall depart</n> יְב֣וּל <sup>2981 </sup> <n>The increase</n> בֵּית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of his house</n> נִ֝גָּר֗וֹת <sup>5064 </sup> <n>[and his goods] shall flow away</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> אַפּֽוֹ׃ <sup>639 </sup> <n>of his wrath</n>
29: זֶ֤ה ׀ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> חֵֽלֶק־ <sup>2506 </sup> <n>This [is] the portion</n> אָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> רָ֭שָׁע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of a wicked</n> מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>from God</n> וְנַחֲלַ֖ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>and the heritage</n> אִמְר֣וֹ <sup>561 </sup> <n>appointed</n> מֵאֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>unto him by God</n> פ
